document.full_text: top asian car makers honda motor  and hyundai motor  painted vastly different portraits on thursday, with hyundai turning in a stellar quarterly performance while honda struggled to overcome supply woes after japan's devastating earthquake.
document.title: honda struggles with quake fallout, hyundai surges
lines_and_colors: top asian car makers honda motor  and hyundai motor  painted vastly different portraits on thursday, with hyundai turning in a stellar quarterly performance while honda struggled to overcome supply woes after japan's devastating earthquake.
